verses.name: Psalms 55:21
verses.text: The words of his mouth were smoother than butter, but war was in his heart: his words were softer than oil, yet were they drawn swords.

verses.name: Psalms 55:22
verses.text: Cast thy burden upon the Lord, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.

verses.name: Psalms 55:23
verses.text: But thou, O God, shalt bring them down into the pit of destruction: bloody and deceitful men shall not live out half their days; but I will trust in thee.
